title: Sawbones Classic: History of Abortion
description: It's Election Day in the United States of America, and so we present this Sawbones episode on the history of abortion from May 2022. Go vote!With the recent news about Roe v. Wade, it’s important to talk about the history of abortion in the United States. The right to autonomy over one’s own body in regard to medical care is one of the basic tenets of medical ethics; but no matter what anyone personally believes, banning abortion doesn’t stop abortion. It just makes it unsafe.  Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers https://taxpayers.bandcamp.com/
author: Justin & Dr. Sydnee McElroy
